nodes.excerpt: Peanut helps you pick better flights and hotels. See current COVID-19 travel rules and visa requirements while browsing, and even flight delay predictions before you book. Try Peanut on Expedia, Booking or Google Flights today. Add to Chrome, it's free.

nodes.excerpt: Savely is the iOS app designed to help you save up for your next vacation by first showing you the real cost behind your travel plans â€” that way, youâ€™ll know exactly how much money to start stashing. Vacations start with a goal, your goals start with Savely.

nodes.excerpt: Spot is a geographic video sharing app that finds and shares undiscovered places across the globe. Recorded videos will automatically be pinned on the map without manually tagging them. Start sharing â€” your ordinary life can be someone elseâ€™s extraordinary.

nodes.excerpt: Camperguru saves time looking for the best spots. We work with photographers and experienced campers to find the 'creme de la creme' of camping. We personally visit, photograph and review camper spots. We don't list all spots. Just the best ones. 46 for now.
nodes.title: Camperguru - Collecting the 5% best camping & vanlife spots

nodes.excerpt: Cheep is a native iOS app that helps you find and discover amazing, really cheap flight deals --- and mistake fares that save up to 90% on tickets to/from over 200 domestic and international destinations. Widgets, dark mode, watchOS companion app and more!
nodes.title: Cheep - Save up to 90% on flights to 200 places around the world

nodes.excerpt: Simplify your travel with Travi. Explore your travel destinations and bookmark your favorite things to do from activities to food options. Let us know your travel preferences and we will create a personalized itinerary to follow along day-by-day.
nodes.title: Travi - Easy travel planning with personalized itinerary
nodes.author: Joseph Lupo

nodes.excerpt: Congrats, you got the Covid-19 vaccine. Now save the record for free with VaxYes. In 3 easy steps you can get a secure, digital vaccine record that you can use for Travel, Live Shows, and Employers. Get your free, secure, verified digital vaccine card.
nodes.title: VaxYes - Free, secure, verified, digital vaccine card
nodes.author: Mouyyad Abdulhadi

nodes.excerpt: The tool estimates the number of trees that you have to plant in your country to delay global warming (following the Paris Agreement) and reduce earth's temperature rise to 1.5 â„ƒ by 2030. Reducing number of CO2 emissions-related deaths by 700,000 till 2030
nodes.title: Save the Secret - How many trees do we have to plant to delay global warming

nodes.excerpt: YESIM is the most functional eSIM application in the world. Having only eSIM compatible device and YESIM App, you get an opportunity to connect mobile internet in 126+ countries in the world, without paying roaming fees or changing sim-cards.
nodes.title: Yesim - International eSIM application

nodes.excerpt: Discover the perfect backdrops for your pictures. Save on the go, plan trips visually and explore beautiful locations around the world.
